categories/awesomeness.name: BA Premium Membership
categories/awesomeness.description: Enjoy 20% off Blue Apron meals and wine for a year!

categories/specialty.name: The Prep Bundle
categories/specialty.description: Prep like a pro with the right chef-approved essentials. This all-in-one assortment includes an easy-to-use garlic press, time-saving citrus squeeze, small-yet-mighty greens stripper, tried-and-true peeler and state-of-the-art zester. It’s the perfect assortment for novice and experienced chefs alike and will make even the most time-consuming cooking seem like a breeze.

categories/specialty.name: Greens Stripper
categories/specialty.description: This time-saving tool will help you strip leaves in mere seconds. Small but mighty, it can be used to prep any green–whether you’re cooking with kale, Swiss chard, rosemary and beyond. Founded by a kitchen gadget inventor with more than 30 years of experience, this tiny tool has stripped over 8 million leaves–and more than 400,000 of them have been sold to date.

categories/specialty.name: Citrus Squeeze
categories/specialty.description: You can now add delicious (and healthy) citrus flavors to your favorite drinks and dishes in no time. Featuring solid “T” handles, a powerful lever, a heavy-duty hinge and an extra large bowl, this stainless steel essential is equipped to squeeze the juice from limes, small oranges, tangerines and other small citrus fruit. As an added perk, the looped handles make it easy to hang and store. Plus, it’s designed with an an easy-to-clean surface and no tarnishable ceramic coatings or finishes.

categories/specialty.name: Garlic Press
categories/specialty.description: Slicing garlic has never been simpler. This two-sided essential is designed to do two jobs in one: crush garlic and slice it. Made by Harold Import Company, a family-owned American business with over 50 years of experience, this easy-to-use press owes its incredible durability to its heavyweight, stainless steel construction. To use it, simply place the clove in the hopper and press downward for freshly pressed garlic, or flip it over to get uniform slices of garlic. And to ensure minimal mess, it includes a handy cleaning tool for removing leftover pressed garlic after use.

categories/specialty.name: Come-Apart Kitchen Shears
categories/specialty.description: One of the unsung heros of every kitchen, a pair of handy kitchen shears can significantly improve your cooking experience. That’s why our Culinary team depends on these Swiss-made kitchen shears by Victorinox for everything from trimming meats to cutting herbs. They’re ergonomically designed with textured, slip-resistant handles for ease of use in any meal prep scenario. Plus, the handle features a built-in bottle opener, so you’ll want them on hand when entertaining.
categories/specialty.subtitle: by Victorinox

categories/specialty.name: Benriner Mandoline Slicer
categories/specialty.description: Prep fruits and vegetables with the ease of a chef with this simple yet savvy slicer. Made from handcrafted Japanese stainless steel blades, this convenient tool will slice your ingredients into consistently sized pieces that cook evenly. It features four interchangeable blades for wide slices, chunky cuts, long narrow and extra-narrow julienne strips, so you can whip up French fries, garnishes, stir fries and beyond. For added safety, it’s designed with a guard that holds smaller pieces to protect your fingers and an easy dial that adjusts thickness. Easy to use, it also boasts large open handles for comfort and a nonskid rubber base for optimal stability.

categories/specialty.name: Marinade Injector
categories/specialty.description: Make your marinade work harder, with minimal effort. This Stainless Steel Marinade Injector enhances the juiciness, tenderness and flavor of any meat. Simply inject the meat with your favorite marinade, whether it’s a traditional preparation or any other flavorful liquid, from beer to salad dressing, and enjoy!

categories/specialty.name: Baster
categories/specialty.description: Baste your way to the most succulent, crisp-skinned turkey you ever did taste. Ideal for drizzling pan drippings or flavorful stock over the bird, this high-quality baster features a stand-on-its-own silicone bulb and comes with a cleaning brush that conveniently stores inside the tube for easy cleaning.

categories/specialty.name: Ramekins, Set of 4
categories/specialty.description: You might be familiar with ramekins in the context of how one bakes a delicious crème brulée! But do you know what else these classic white ceramic bowls are perfect for? Serving individual desserts and custards, dressings, condiments, sauces...and the list goes on. Durable and dependable, this set of four will become a daily staple in your cooking routine.
categories/specialty.subtitle: by BIA Cordon Bleu

categories/specialty.name: Pizza Stone
categories/specialty.description: Cook homemade pizza in style with the perfect pizza tool: a pizza stone! Featuring built in handles for easy removal from the oven or grill, the round pizza stone is great for making pizza, bread and other baked goods in the comfort of your kitchen. The ThermaBond™ stone is manufactured with Pizzacraft’s exclusive ThermaBond™ technology: it’s specially formulated to eliminate thermal shock breakage, promote even heat distribution and retention and guaranteed durability for consistent cooking.
categories/specialty.subtitle: by Pizzacraft

categories/specialty.name: Pizza Peel
categories/specialty.description: Eat pizza in style with your very own wooden pizza peel! Transferring your pizza onto a heated pizza stone or brick oven, and taking your bubbling, cheesy pizza out and to the table will be as easy as pie with this 24-inches by 14-inches pizza peel. Plus, it will win you points as a stylish home pizzaiolo. The peel also isn’t pizza-specific—use it to transfer baked goods like pastries, bread and more!

categories/specialty.name: Pizza Bundle
categories/specialty.description: Pizza lovers, this bundle’s for you. Cook your pizza in style using these perfect pizza tools: a pizza stone, pizza peel and kitchen shears. Featuring built in handles, the round pizza stone is just what you need to create great homemade pizza, bread and other baked goods in the comfort of your kitchen. Leave it in the oven to help maintain a more even and consistent temperature. Meanwhile, the wooden pizza peel makes transferring your pizzas in and out of the oven easy as pie. Kitchen shears—the true unsung hero of every kitchen—are also super handy for cutting pizza slices. Together, this pizza bundle of your dreams (and ours, too) will win you points as a stylish home pizzaiolo and make your cooking experience even easier.

categories/specialty.name: Food Chopper
categories/specialty.description: In search of a food preparer that makes essential kitchen tasks like chopping, puréeing and grinding easy and effortless? Look no further than the Cuisinart Elite Collection™ 4 Cup Chopper/Grinder! Cut down your prep time by using this food chopper for all of your delicate chopping, soft puréeing and grinding needs! It’s so versatile, it’ll make you wonder how you ever survived in the kitchen without it. The ever-innovative Cuisinart, known for transforming American kitchens with their introduction of the food processor, continues to take essential kitchen tools to the next level.
categories/specialty.subtitle: by Cuisinart

categories/specialty.name: Electric Knife Sharpener
categories/specialty.description: The secret to keeping your knives in tip-top slicing shape is all in the sharpener. This professional-grade, three-stage knife sharpener uses 10% diamond-coated disks to sharpen and hone your knives with professional-level accuracy. And to achieve a lustrous polish, it uses flexible stropping disks. More efficient than time-consuming knife stones, it will also add years to your knives’ lifespan. You’ll never want to slice, dice or prep without one again. Works great with our knives as seen in the video below.
categories/specialty.subtitle: by Chef'sChoice
categories/specialty.cms_text:
Using Your Chef’s Choice EdgeSelect Diamond Hone Sharpener — A Quick Overview

Stage 1: For new or very dull knives, Stage 1 is your knife-sharpening starting point. Eight-inch blades should take about four seconds to pull through, while shorter blades should take less time.

Stage 2: Pull the blade through the left slot of Stage 2, and then through the right slot of Stage 2. Before moving on, confirm the presence of a burr along the knife’s edge.

Stage 3: Achieve a razor-sharp edge with just one or two pairs of pulls in Stage 3. Additional pulls will result in a very refined edge, ideal for gourmet food preparation. Fewer pulls are better for knives used to cut fibrous foods.

Note: Be sure to refer to the complete instructions before operating your knife sharpener.

categories/specialty.name: 6 Qt. 3-in-1 Slow Cooker
categories/specialty.description: Whether you’re cooking for your family or for a crowd, making delicious meals is always easy with this premium Cuisinart Multicooker. Thanks to three preset functions—sauté, steam and slow cook—this multifunctional cooker lets you prepare any recipe, while a convenient Keep Warm feature automatically turns on when the cooking is complete so you don’t have to constantly watch over the meal.
categories/specialty.subtitle: by Cuisinart

categories/specialty.name: Cleanblend Blender
categories/specialty.description: This high performance, commercial-grade blender features an impressive 3 horsepower, 1800w motor that makes for powerful and smooth blending. With an oversized, durable container and stainless steel enclosed blade, it’s perfect for everything from making the smoothest of smoothies and soups to dips, desserts and nut butters.

categories/specialty.name: Immersion Blender
categories/specialty.description: Blending is a breeze with our sleek Smart Stick 2 Speech Hand Blender by Cuisinart. Featuring a two-speed, 200-watt motor, it swiftly blends whatever you’re craving in mere minutes—think puréed soup, a warming cup of hot chocolate, or a refreshing and nutritious breakfast smoothie. It's ergonomically designed grip offers comfortable hold and more control while blending, while a one-touch control allows for easy, one-handed blending.
categories/specialty.subtitle: by Cuisinart

categories/specialty.name: Precision Master 5.5 Qt. Stand Mixer
categories/specialty.description: Simple, stylish and high-performing, this Cuisinart Stand Mixer will save you time and effort in your baking and cooking endeavors. Featuring a 500-watt motor, die-cast metal construction and 12 speeds for precision mixing, this multi-functional workhorse has a tilt-back head that allows for easy access to its mixing bowl, while the included splash guard make messy countertops a thing of the past.
categories/specialty.subtitle: by Cuisinart

categories/specialty.name: Coffee Grinder
categories/specialty.description: Boasting high-precision performance, our KRUPS coffee grinder makes delicious and satisfying freshly ground coffee, for the perfect start to your morning. A true coffee lover’s essential, it features a compact frame that’s suited to any kitchen and a metal flat burr grinder to ensure consistency. Plus, the cup selector easily lets you choose between 2-12 cups, and the auto-stop function guarantees full control and safety. Other convenient features: a removable 15 oz. container, a removable top burr for effortless cleaning, and a large-capacity 7 oz. clear coffee bean container.
categories/specialty.subtitle: by Krups

categories/specialty.name: French Press
categories/specialty.description: This 18 oz. stainless-steel French Press by ESPRO will lend a contemporary touch to your countertop. Featuring a unique double coffee micro-filter, it yields clean, delicious coffee every time, helping you avoid the grit and mess of conventional press coffee. Built with a safety lock to ensure the glass vessel won’t come loose, this fuss-free press is the one you’ll come to rely on every morning. Better yet, it’s made with thicker, more robust glass that helps coffee stay hot longer, so you can savor yours throughout your morning.
categories/specialty.subtitle: by Espro

categories/specialty.name: Mix N' Masher
categories/specialty.description: Enjoy perfectly fluffy mashed potatoes (and yams, squash, turnips, bananas...and more!) with this sturdy masher. Made from durable stainless steel that will never rust, it’s user-friendly—just press wires into soft cooked foods until your desired consistency is achieved— and easy to clean.

categories/specialty.name: Monaco Cheese Slicer
categories/specialty.description: For more than 100 years, Holland-based Boska has been producing some of the most distinguished cheese tools in the world. Their stainless steel Cheese Slicer is no exception. Designed with slight flexibility in the blade for ease of use, this kitchen essential is perfect for slicing semi-hard and hard cheese. The thinner the slice, the more oxygen enters the cheese, yielding even more delicious flavor. Plus, the checkered pattern and non-stick coating prevent the cheese from sticking or rolling.
categories/specialty.subtitle: by Boska

categories/specialty.name: Cheese Knife Mini, Set of 4
categories/specialty.description: Cheese lovers, this one’s for you! Our Cheese Knives Set by Holland-based Boska—purveyor of some of the world’s most distinguished cheese tools—is perfect for spreading or cutting. Designed from a single piece of metal, this stainless-steel set includes a grease knife, cheese knife, soft cheese knife, and parmesan knife. Cue the cheese party!
categories/specialty.subtitle: by Boska

categories/specialty.name: Partyclette
categories/specialty.description: For more than 100 years, Holland-based Boska has been producing some of the most distinguished cheese tools in the world. Thanks to their Partyclette—a mini raclette used for melt cheese to enjoy on baguettes, crackers, and beyond—it’s never been easier to take your cheese and wine nights on the go. Featuring a distinctive dark wooden frame, a barbeclette, three tea lights, and a handy spatula, this raclette will be a hit at parties big and small. Plus, its compact and anti-stick coating make it easy to clean.
categories/specialty.subtitle: by Boska

categories/specialty.name: Table Grater with Oak Stand
categories/specialty.description: Made of stainless steel and European oak wood, this retro-inspired grater doubles as a sophisticated table setting. Created by Boska—purveyor of some of the world’s most distinguished cheese tools—this must-have cooking companion includes a tray for ease of use and three shred sizes: large flakes, finely grated, and powdered.
categories/specialty.subtitle: by Boska

categories/specialty.name: Cast Iron Scrubber
categories/specialty.description: Ever wonder how to successfully clean out your cast iron, glass or stainless steel skillet without resorting to harmful detergents or a fresh dishcloth? At last, here’s a fast and effective way to keep your skillet seasoned and clean! Simply use warm water and the residue will scrub away—no detergent or soap necessary. To clean the small ring scrubber, just rinse with soapy water or run it through the dishwasher.

categories/specialty.name: Boos Block Mystery Oil
categories/specialty.description: Our John Boos & Co.’s cutting boards are among are most reliable and hardworking staples in our test kitchen. To keep ours working and looking like new, we apply a generous amount of Boos Block Mystery Oil every 3 to 4 weeks–or whenever we notice dry spots on our board. In the morning, we wipe it off, and like a charm, it’s back in top shape. The food-grade oil is thinner than most, so it penetrates deep into the wood for optimal effects. And because John Boos & Co. has over 125 years in the business, it knows how to make exceptional goods stand the test of time.
categories/specialty.subtitle: by John Boos & Co. for Blue Apron
categories/specialty.cms_text:
The Story Behind John Boos & Co.

There’s a reason why John Boos & Co.’s cutting boards are the standard in the culinary world. These hardwood goods are exceptionally made to stand the test of time. The Illinois-based company has had some practice—more than 125 years of it. In addition to its proud heritage, John Boos & Co. is also committed to environmentally responsible production, ensured by partnerships with hardwood foresters that follow sustainable practices.

It’s designed to hold our custom-made pairing-size wine bottles, as well as standard-size wine and champagne bottles. Made of sturdy stainless steel, it easily slides apart to fit the four included non-toxic (and reusable) freezer gels, meaning you’ll never have to wipe up melted ice. And because it will keep your wine at proper serving temperatures for up to three hours, you’ll have plenty of time to sip and savor–both indoors and outdoors.

categories/wine.name: Tritan Stemless Wine Glasses, Set of 2
categories/wine.description: Created by Bernadotte & Kylberg, a renowned design duo that includes the Prince of Sweden, this virtually weightless-looking stemless wine glass epitomizes elegance. When the designers first visited the master glassmakers at Zwiesel Kristallglas, they developed an instant affinity for the process, particularly the way it intersects with air. Their glass blown designs, aptly named Air, were born of this passion and are the lightest machine-made glasses ever made. Each design boasts a delicate, slightly curved form that perfectly complements their crystal-clear appearance. Made of TRITAN® PROTECT, a technology that provides glass with double the protection, these striking designs create the perfect sensory balance.

categories/wine.description: This is a must-have bundle for any and all wine-lovers! categories/wine.name: Walnut Zippity Two-Step Corkscrew
categories/wine.description: Wine lovers will cherish the ease, efficiency and old-world elegance of this multi-purpose corkscrew. Made by the experts at Metrokane, this walnut-finished beauty shaves 10 seconds off each cork pull due to it’s ultra-efficient two-step process. First it trims the wine foil, then quickly spirals into any type of cork (even plastic), meaning you can spend less time fussing with uncorking and more time savoring. Cheers!
categories/wine.subtitle: by Metrokane
categories/wine.cms_text:
Using Your Two-Step Corkscrew — A Quick Overview

Step 1: Using the retractable knife, cut the foil cap by placing the knife under the lip of the bottle and twisting in a circle. Once cut all the way around, pop off the foil cap and retract the knife.

Step 2: Place the tip of the screw onto the cork, slightly off-center, so that when you twist the screw it goes into the middle of the cork. Continue twisting the screw into the cork with even pressure until the spiral is completely in the cork.

Step 3: Place the first hinge of the corkscrew on the lip of the bottle, hold in place and lever the handle to pull the cork about halfway out of the bottle. Now move the second hinge of the corkscrew to the lip of the bottle, this gives you extra leverage to make pulling out the rest of the cork effortless, mess free and fast!

categories/wine.name: Slate Cheese Board
categories/wine.description: Perfect for the hostess with mostess (or the person who knows just what to gift them), our slate cheese boards from Brooklyn Slate Co. are a distinctive surface for serving cheeses, charcuterie, hors d’oeuvres and more. Made using materials sourced from the company’s family slate quarry in upstate New York, each rustic yet sophisticated board features a natural edge and includes a burlap bag and anti-slip padded feet. And so you can add your own personal touch, they also include soapstone chalk for writing the names of all your fancy French-imported cheeses—or a simple message to your guests.
categories/wine.subtitle: by Brooklyn Slate Co.

categories/wine.name: Slate Coasters, Set of 4
categories/wine.description: These rustic yet sophisticated coasters from Brooklyn Slate Co. are made to withstand a range of temperatures, making them the ones to reach for whether you’re sipping a warming cup of coffee or opening an ice cold beer. Sourced from the company’s family slate quarry in upstate New York, these distinctive coasters are perfect for gifting, but we have a feeling you’ll want to stock up for your own home, as well.
categories/wine.subtitle: by Brooklyn Slate Co.

categories/wine.name: A Year of Wine: Gift Card
categories/wine.description: Make their month...or better yet, make their year. Give the gift of world-class wine pairings to someone special for an entire year and it’ll surely be love at first sip. Every month we deliver six pairing-size bottles of exclusive wine, complete with tasting cards, pairing tips and the story behind every bottle. Our wines are hand-crafted by award-winning winemakers to enhance Blue Apron meals, or can be savored solo. Valued at $720, we’re selling this special gift card for $650—which means an entire month of wine is on the house!
categories/wine.subtitle: Sale!

categories/wine.name: Wine Gift Card: 2 Months
categories/wine.description: Forget to get a gift? We’ve got your back! This card is perfect for wine-lovers, friends and colleagues alike, whether or not they’re Blue Apron meal subscribers. Although Blue Apron Wine pairs perfectly with our meals, they can also be savored solo. With this gift card, every month they’ll get six exclusive, pairing-size, world-class wines delivered straight to their door—with tasting notes, pairing tips and the story behind every wine come in every box, too!

categories/wine.name: 6 Blue Apron All-Stars
categories/wine.description: This red and white 6 bottle collection contains all of the essentials. A classic French Bordeaux, Oregon pinot noir, and California Cab are some of our favorite reds in our collection. When it comes to whites, we have selected a sauvignon blanc from the heralded Potter Valley in New Zealand to go along with a clean crisp German style riesling and a white burgundy to round out the offering. Whether you are stocking your home cellar or bringing them to a party, we are confident you will love our collection of some of our personal favorites.

categories/wine.name: Full Spectrum Reds
categories/wine.description: We’ve compiled a tasting selection of some of our favorite reds, from the bold & spicy Château Grand Jean Bordeaux Supérieur from Bordeaux, France to the plush & fruity Airfield Estates Cabernet Sauvignon from Yakima Valley, Washington. These wines were all crafted to be food friendly, and at 500 ml each, this is a perfect sampling of our wine collection. Give them a try!

categories/wine.name: Dinner Party Pack
categories/wine.description: This red and white wine collection features 3 bottles of some of our favorite varietals to get the party started! Inside you will find a classic unoaked French chardonnay to open up the palate along with quintessential a California cab and French Bordeaux blend that perfectly encapsulates what makes both terroris so legendary.

categories/wine.name: 6 Shades of Reds
categories/wine.description: This red wine collection features 6 bottles of several of our favorites. Representing some of the most vaunted terroirs in both France and the United States, each bottle represents the diverse flavors and experiences found in red wine. Highlighted by Vignobles Bulliat’s 91 point offering and Sans Liege’s take on the legendary red wines of France’s Châteauneuf-du-Pape, this 6 pack has everything you need to experience red wine at its best.

categories/wine.name: 6 Shades of Whites
categories/wine.description: This white wine collection features 6 bottles of some of our springtime favorites ranging from light and fruity to crisp and clean. We selected these 6 wines as they each represent a unique flavor profile indicative of both the terroir and the winemaking process. Both the 17 Leaf and Vine and 17 Chanin Gruner Veltliner selectively utilize oak barrels creating a uniqueness not found in typical bottles of the same varietal. Take a sip and let us know if you notice the technique!

categories/exclusives.name: Blue Apron x Irving Farm Chef's Blend Coffee
categories/exclusives.description: We’re delighted to bring you our Blue Apron Chef’s Blend—our first signature coffee—created in collaboration with Irving Farm Coffee Roasters. Available exclusively on our Market, this lush, full-bodied roast was produced by Irving Farm Coffee Roasters in Millerton, New York. Developed by our Test Kitchen to draw in notes of warm spices and rich caramel, our Chef’s Blend creates a balanced flavor with hints of sweetness.
categories/exclusives.subtitle: by Irving Farm and Blue Apron

categories/exclusives.name: The Blue Apron Cookbook
categories/exclusives.description: Look and act like a chef in the kitchen with our cookbook + blue apron bundle! Designed to inspire a new generation of cooks, our new cookbook includes a collection of easy-to-make, delicious and technique-driven recipes perfect for anyone looking to be more creative in the kitchen. With nearly 800 color photographs and the same easy step-by-step instructions our customers know and love, this must-have cooking companion will transform novice cooks into confident home chefs. And more than just a fashion statement, the blue apron—modeled after those worn by professional chefs worldwide—is a symbol of lifelong learning in the kitchen.
categories/exclusives.subtitle: Free Apron with Purchase!

categories/exclusives.name: The Blue Apron
categories/exclusives.description: More than just a fashion statement, the blue apron is a symbol of lifelong learning in the kitchen.  The custom version of our namesake is modeled after aprons worn by professional chefs worldwide. With a double-lined bib and an embroidered Blue Apron logo, this 100% cotton, premium apron will elevate your comfort level in the kitchen and prepare you to try any recipe.
categories/exclusives.cms_text:
#myblueapron

Dicing carrots in your kitchen? Taking a cooking class in Cinque Terre? Wear your apron with pride!
Post a photo of yourself using #myblueapron, and we may feature you here!

categories/exclusives.name: The Children's Blue Apron
categories/exclusives.description: This kid-sized apron will transform the hungriest helpers into the cutest cooks in the kitchen. Like our adult version, this bold blue apron is modeled after the same designs worn by professional chefs around the world. It’s made with a double-lined bib and features a contrasting embroidered Blue Apron logo. It’s an easy (and adorable) way to inspire an early and lifelong love of cooking.

categories/exclusives.name: The Blue Apron Set
categories/exclusives.description: The recipe for success in the kitchen is a good apron, a clear view of your recipe, and a place to keep your recipes for reference and storage. With the blue apron representing chefs in training around the world, a holder to keep recipes in place, and an elegant, water-resistant binder, this kit sets the stage for cooks of all levels to prepare any meal with confidence and in style.

categories/exclusives.name: Recipe Card Holder
categories/exclusives.description: Is your sous chef tired of holding up the recipe card for you? Are you tired of picking it up and putting it down over and over again? We understand, that’s why we found you a handy, hands-free solution! Our custom kitchen assistant will allow you to cook with a clutter-free counter and keep your Blue Apron recipes front and center for at-a-glance, step-by-step instruction. The magnetic base can hold up to three Blue Apron recipe cards—and is small enough to be tucked in a drawer when not in use.
categories/exclusives.subtitle: by Architec

categories/exclusives.name: The Blue Apron Recipe Binder
categories/exclusives.description: Finally the perfect place to keep your Blue Apron recipe cards together—and organized.  This elegant and water-resistant binder includes tabs and protective sheets to customize its set up. Even when you’re improvising, you can take a peek inside for inspiration. This beautiful binder deserves a place next to your favorite cookbooks.

categories/exclusives.name: Margrethe Nested Mixing Bowls, Set of 3
categories/exclusives.description: These streamlined mixing bowls by Rosti Mepal, which were originally designed in Denmark in 1954, are iconic for a reason—not only are they high quality and high functioning, they were named after the Princess, now Queen Margrethe of Denmark. Their durable melamine construction means they’ll be an integral part of your kitchen for years to come. A no-slip ring on the bottom makes for easy whisking, whipping and stirring, while the clear lids let you go straight from prep to the fridge. We’ll take three please!
categories/exclusives.subtitle: by Rosti Mepal

categories/exclusives.name: The Prep Bundle
categories/exclusives.description: Prep like a pro with the right chef-approved essentials. This all-in-one assortment includes an easy-to-use garlic press, time-saving citrus squeeze, small-yet-mighty greens stripper, tried-and-true peeler and state-of-the-art zester. It’s the perfect assortment for novice and experienced chefs alike and will make even the most time-consuming cooking seem like a breeze.

categories/exclusives.name: Vegetable Peeler
categories/exclusives.description: The simple, ergonomic design and super-sharp stainless steel blade is why we turned to Kuhn Rikon to create our custom vegetable peeler. We constantly reach for this tool in our kitchen, whether we’re peeling carrots or zesting lemons. Its Y-shaped handle allows for easy peeling of fruits and veggies in any shape and size, and the rounded tip even removes tricky potato eyes with ease. Crafted in Switzerland by Kuhn Rikon, this dishwasher safe, lightweight, all-purpose peeler stays sharp even with regular use.
categories/exclusives.subtitle: by Kuhn Rikon for Blue Apron
categories/exclusives.cms_text:
The Story Behind Kuhn Rikon

Kuhn Rikon combines Swiss precision and quality craftsmanship with a touch of whimsy. The family-owned company has been in the cookware business for more than 80 years, reinventing classics and inventing new products that are both functional and fun. Its designers have reimagined basic vegetable peelers and can-openers as quirky accessories that lend kitchen prepwork a does of bright color and high style.

categories/exclusives.name: The Kitchen Drawer
categories/exclusives.description: Featuring the same tried-and-true tools our Culinary team swears by in the test kitchen (and their own kitchens, too), our kitchen drawer bundle includes: a custom French wire whisk, a pair of sturdy tongs, the "use-with-every-recipe" olive wood spoon, an exoglass spatula and a versatile silicone spatula. Get this bundle for novice chefs—consider it their starter pack that includes all the items they’ll need to cook with confidence and style! Or, it’s also an appropriate gift for more experienced chefs, as an upgrade to their most well-loved items in their kitchen.

categories/exclusives.name: Heat-Proof Silicone Spatula, 11"
categories/exclusives.description: We’re fans of revolutionizing. That’s why we partnered with the innovators at GIR to create the most versatile spatula our Culinary team has ever cooked with. Founded as a passion project by designer Samantha Rose, who was tired of cooking with old-school kitchen utensils, GIR designed this multi-use spatula that works like a dream and can withstand scalding hot temperatures. Both multi-functional and easy on the eyes, it features a strong polymer core that retains little heat–in fact it’s heat-resistant at up to 550°F.
categories/exclusives.subtitle: by GIR for Blue Apron
categories/exclusives.cms_text:
The Story Behind GIR

Launched in 2012, the first GIR spatula was a passion project for founder Sam Rose, who was frustrated with cooking utensils that just didn't feel right. She labored to create her dream tool, a multi-use spatula that could withstand truly high heat and look great at the same time. After a successful Kickstarter campaign powered by numerous fans and devoted customers, GIR designed, built, and launched this revolutionary spatula.

categories/exclusives.name: French Wire Whisk, 10"
categories/exclusives.description: We enlisted the help of Best Manufacturers to design a custom wire whisk that will enhance your savory specialities–think bechamel, vinaigrette or pan sauce. How? Instead of simply aerating your ingredients, it efficiently emulsifies them–creating the perfect blend for your dish. And to ensure no drop is abandoned, the elongated form and thin, springy wire enable the whisk to graze every inch of your saucepans and bowls. Made in the USA, it features a wooden handle featuring a mini apron that nods to our namesake.

categories/exclusives.name: Prepd x Blue Apron Lunchbox
categories/exclusives.description: Say goodbye to the sad desk lunch! We’ve partnered with Prepd to bring you this exclusive lunch box, which is equal parts stylish and functional. Handcrafted from high-quality natural bamboo and a precision engineered polymer, this slim and secure case comes with three premium leak-proof containers that can be arranged in multiple configurations to suit whatever is on the menu that day. Plus, an integrated placemat and a set of magnetic silverware means you can open up and enjoy your meal anywhere without rummaging around for utensils or worrying about making a mess. Lunch is served! For an extra layer of protection, check out our Prepd Sleeve. Looking for more containers? Check out our extra Prepd Container Set. To keep your food extra cool and fresh for longer, try our Cool Sticks
categories/exclusives.subtitle: Back in stock!

categories/exclusives.name: Prepd Container Set
categories/exclusives.description: Craving even more flexibility? This extra set of modular containers makes a great companion to your Lunchbox, giving you even more configurations to choose from. Plus, more containers means you can plan your lunches days in advance. Did we mention they’re stackable, so storing and organizing is a cinch!

categories/exclusives.name: Prepd Sleeve
categories/exclusives.description: Made from premium fabric-lined Neoprene, this handsome black sleeve adds an extra layer of protection for your Lunchbox and ensures your food’s temperature stays consistent. We love how the handy strap lets you easily carry your pack in one hand.

categories/exclusives.name: Prepd Cool Sticks
categories/exclusives.description: Sleeker than your average ice pack, these cool sticks take up less room in your freezer. Simply freeze them overnight, then clip them inside your Lunchbox to keep your food cool and fresh until you’re ready to dig in.

categories/exclusives.name: The Chopping Station
categories/exclusives.description: Prep work becomes simple when you’re using the sharpest knives on a great cutting board. That’s why we’ve partnered with both Togiharu, a renowned maker of the finest Japanese steel, and John Boos & Co., the industry standard in chopping blocks, to bring you our favorite two knives and the board that helps them work fast and keeps them sharp. Japanese knives, known for their lightness and sharp blades, stay that way longer when used on the maple board.

categories/exclusives.name: Large Maple Cutting Board
categories/exclusives.description:
Backordered: Estimated ship date 05/01/2018

Our chefs agree: the key to a proper prep station is a durable cutting board. Built to last, this hardy American maple chopping board can handle all your prepping needs, one rough chop at a time. Its durable surface won’t warp, is resistant to scoring and magically, it’ll even keep your blades sharper than other materials. Crafted in an exclusive collaboration between Blue Apron and John Boos & Co., these boards can be found in our test kitchen as well as professional kitchens around the world. Plus, it’s so elegant we never want to take it off of our countertops.
categories/exclusives.subtitle: by John Boos & Co. for Blue Apron
categories/exclusives.cms_text:
The Story Behind John Boos & Co.

There’s a reason why John Boos & Co.’s cutting boards are the standard in the culinary world. These hardwood goods are exceptionally made to stand the test of time. The Illinois-based company has had some practice—more than 125 years of it. In addition to its proud heritage, John Boos & Co. is also committed to environmentally responsible production, ensured by partnerships with hardwood foresters that follow sustainable practices.

categories/exclusives.name: Chef & Petty Knife Set
categories/exclusives.description: This handcrafted twinset is designed to tackle the trickiest chopping challenges. A personal favorite of Blue Apron co-founder and chef Matt Wadiak, Togiharu is a renowned maker of the finest Japanese steel and uses traditional techniques perfected over centuries. Our Culinary team worked closely with the makers of Togiharu to create a chef and petty knife set that’s enviably durable, sharp and easy to use, boasting stainless steel blades with impeccable edge retention. The result rivals the quality and precision of blades used by the world’s most celebrated chefs.
categories/exclusives.cms_text:
The Story Behind Togiharu for Blue Apron

Blue Apron Co-Founder and Chef Matthew Wadiak is a long-time fan of Korin, a tiny storefront in Manhattan that’s home to the most extensive collection of Japanese chef’s knives in the world (including Japan). In addition to the array of imported knives, Korin produces its own collection, Togiharu, named for the master Japanese craftsman who mentored Korin’s founder. The line is handmade in Japan using traditional techniques perfected over centuries. Our culinary team worked closely with the makers of Togiharu to create knives for the home cook with the same elegance and performance of those found in the hands of professional chefs. The final creation is a pleasure to use and designed to be a part of your kitchen arsenal for decades.

categories/exclusives.name: Handcrafted Japanese Chef's Knife, 8.2"
categories/exclusives.description: Every skilled chef’s secret weapon, the right chef’s knife can simplify any cooking experience–and cut prep time in half. We joined forces with Togiharu, a world-class purveyor of Japanese steel and a favorite of Blue Apron co-founder Matt Wadiak, to create a chef’s knife that suits both experienced and budding chefs alike. Handcrafted in Japan, this exclusive knife is crafted using traditional Japanese techniques perfected over centuries, and features a sharp, stainless steel blade that allows for ultra-refined cuts.
categories/exclusives.subtitle: by Togiharu for Blue Apron
categories/exclusives.cms_text:
The Story Behind Togiharu for Blue Apron

Blue Apron Co-Founder and Chef Matthew Wadiak is a long-time fan of Korin, a tiny storefront in Manhattan that’s home to the most extensive collection of Japanese chef’s knives in the world (including Japan). In addition to the array of imported knives, Korin produces its own collection, Togiharu, named for the master Japanese craftsman who mentored Korin’s founder. The line is handmade in Japan using traditional techniques perfected over centuries. Our culinary team worked closely with the makers of Togiharu to create knives for the home cook with the same elegance and performance of those found in the hands of professional chefs. The final creation is a pleasure to use and designed to be a part of your kitchen arsenal for decades.

categories/exclusives.name: Handcrafted Japanese Petty Knife, 5.8"
categories/exclusives.description: Handcrafted in Japan, our chef-approved petty knife meticulously masters the most intricate hand-prep tasks–think hulling fruit, supreming citrus or seeding peppers. Our Culinary team worked closely with Togiharu, a world-class purveyor of Japanese steel and a favorite of Blue Apron co-founder Matt Wadiak, to design a more petite version of our popular chef’s knife. Boasting a super sharp stainless steel blade and edge retention, it’s the knife you’ll enlist to handle the most delicate of tasks.
categories/exclusives.subtitle: by Togiharu for Blue Apron
categories/exclusives.cms_text:
The Story Behind Togiharu for Blue Apron

Blue Apron Co-Founder and Chef Matthew Wadiak is a long-time fan of Korin, a tiny storefront in Manhattan that’s home to the most extensive collection of Japanese chef’s knives in the world (including Japan). In addition to the array of imported knives, Korin produces its own collection, Togiharu, named for the master Japanese craftsman who mentored Korin’s founder. The line is handmade in Japan using traditional techniques perfected over centuries. Our culinary team worked closely with the makers of Togiharu to create knives for the home cook with the same elegance and performance of those found in the hands of professional chefs. The final creation is a pleasure to use and designed to be a part of your kitchen arsenal for decades.

categories/exclusives.name: Handcrafted Bread Knife
categories/exclusives.description: If freshly baked breads are a fixture in your household, then this handcrafted knife deserves a spot in your kitchen. Made in Japan, it cuts through the toughest crusts without crushing the soft interior (a.k.a. everyone’s favorite part). To create this premium bread knife, we worked with Togiharu–a purveyor of Japanese steel and a favorite of Blue Apron co-founder Matt Wadiak. It not only slices bread with ease, but can also cut delicate fruits and vegetables with precision.
categories/exclusives.subtitle: by Togiharu for Blue Apron
categories/exclusives.cms_text:
The Story Behind Togiharu for Blue Apron

Blue Apron Co-Founder and Chef Matthew Wadiak is a long-time fan of Korin, a tiny storefront in Manhattan that’s home to the most extensive collection of Japanese chef’s knives in the world (including Japan). In addition to the array of imported knives, Korin produces its own collection, Togiharu, named for the master Japanese craftsman who mentored Korin’s founder. The line is handmade in Japan using traditional techniques perfected over centuries. Our culinary team worked closely with the makers of Togiharu to create knives for the home cook with the same elegance and performance of those found in the hands of professional chefs. The final creation is a pleasure to use and designed to be a part of your kitchen arsenal for decades.

categories/exclusives.name: Blue Apron x Raaka Cassia Cinnamon Chocolate
categories/exclusives.description: Introducing our very first chocolate bar, created in exclusive collaboration with Raaka Chocolate. Our deliciously dark chocolate bar is made from scratch using the highest quality certified organic, unroasted cacao beans from the Dominican Republic. Our chefs spent months going back and forth with the experts at Raaka in order to achieve the perfect subtle cinnamon flavor to complement the beans. Talk about dark magic!

categories/exclusives.name: Dark Chocolate Gift Set
categories/exclusives.description: Chocolate lovers, rejoice! This pack of three delicious chocolate bars includes a cinnamon-tinged dark chocolate we created in collaboration with the experts at Raaka, along with two of Raaka’s most popular flavors—Bourbon Cask-Aged and Pink Sea Salt. All three bars are made from scratch, using the highest quality certified organic, unroasted cacao beans from the Dominican Republic.
categories/exclusives.subtitle: By Raaka

categories/exclusives.name: A Year of Wine: Gift Card
categories/exclusives.description: Make their month...or better yet, make their year. Give the gift of world-class wine pairings to someone special for an entire year and it’ll surely be love at first sip. Every month we deliver six pairing-size bottles of exclusive wine, complete with tasting cards, pairing tips and the story behind every bottle. Our wines are hand-crafted by award-winning winemakers to enhance Blue Apron meals, or can be savored solo. Valued at $720, we’re selling this special gift card for $650—which means an entire month of wine is on the house!
categories/exclusives.subtitle: Sale!

categories/exclusives.name: Wine Gift Card: 2 Months
categories/exclusives.description: Forget to get a gift? We’ve got your back! This card is perfect for wine-lovers, friends and colleagues alike, whether or not they’re Blue Apron meal subscribers. Although Blue Apron Wine pairs perfectly with our meals, they can also be savored solo. With this gift card, every month they’ll get six exclusive, pairing-size, world-class wines delivered straight to their door—with tasting notes, pairing tips and the story behind every wine come in every box, too!

categories/essentials.name: 11" Scanpan CTX Nonstick Skillet
categories/essentials.description:
Yes, there is such a thing as the perfect pan: nonstick, never scratches, oven-safe to 500 degrees and lasts forever.

Whether you’re cooking something that requires a delicate touch—think over-easy eggs, seared salmon and paper-thin crepes—or searing big, juicy steaks over high heat, Scanpan defies every conventional assumption made about traditional nonstick cookware. Its smooth, toxic-free cooking surface makes cooking and cleaning a breeze, and it browns, braises, and deglazes like professional cookware—but all on a coated surface so strong, it stands up even to harsh metal utensils. The Scanpan is probably the last pan you’ll ever buy.
categories/essentials.subtitle: For a limited time: get a free spatula with your purchase!

categories/essentials.name: 12.5" Scanpan CTX Nonstick Skillet
categories/essentials.description:
Yes, there is such a thing as the perfect pan: nonstick, never scratches, oven-safe to 500 degrees and lasts forever.

Whether you’re cooking something that requires a delicate touch—think over-easy eggs, seared salmon and paper-thin crepes—or searing big, juicy steaks over high heat, Scanpan defies every conventional assumption made about traditional nonstick cookware. Its smooth, toxic-free cooking surface makes cooking and cleaning a breeze, and it browns, braises, and deglazes like professional cookware—but all on a coated surface so strong, it stands up even to harsh metal utensils. The Scanpan is probably the last pan you’ll ever buy.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Scanpan
categories/essentials.cms_text:
The Story Behind Scanpan

Scanpan has produced high-quality cookware since 1956. Craftsmanship and environmental responsibility go hand in hand for this Danish company: Not only is the nonstick line totally toxic-free, but the company’s pans are also hand-cast with 100% recycled aluminum. More than a sustainable material, the highly conductive metal delivers quick and even heat distribution, allowing cooks to sauté and sear with nary a sticky stop.

categories/essentials.name: The Field Skillet
categories/essentials.description: Meticulously designed by two Brooklyn-based brothers, the Field Skillet is a lighter version of the heavy duty essential you depend on every day. When the duo noticed that modern skillets couldn’t live up to the quality of the vintage ones they grew up using, they were determined to design a contemporary take on an old-school staple. Their resulting Field Skillet is machined and polished, which reduces the weight, increases the fineness of the form and provides a smooth cooking surface. Each eco-friendly pan is made in the USA from 75-90% recycled cast iron, which has a pre-seasoned surface that'll improve over time to form a natural, non-stick surface. It's ideal for cooking a wide-range of dishes, from roasted vegetables to perfectly seared steaks. Due to its incredible versatility, you can braise it over coals, simmer it on the latest induction cooktop, serve it on your table and even hang it on your wall. For an even easier cleaning experience, use our Cast Iron Scrubber.
categories/essentials.subtitle: Ultra-lightweight Cast Iron

categories/essentials.name: Cast-Iron Cocotte
categories/essentials.description: For centuries, cooks have drawn upon the natural heat retention and redistribution properties of cast iron. Now you can enjoy cast-iron cooking at its very finest, thanks to this stylish and versatile pot by Staub. Made with a durable enamel coating, it transfers and retains heat evenly, and includes a heavy lid that seal in moisture, resulting in delicious chilis and stews, perfectly browned meats and more.
categories/essentials.subtitle: By Staub

categories/essentials.name: The Kitchen Drawer
categories/essentials.description: Featuring the same tried-and-true tools our Culinary team swears by in the test kitchen (and their own kitchens, too), our kitchen drawer bundle includes: a custom French wire whisk, a pair of sturdy tongs, the "use-with-every-recipe" olive wood spoon, an exoglass spatula and a versatile silicone spatula. Get this bundle for novice chefs—consider it their starter pack that includes all the items they’ll need to cook with confidence and style! Or, it’s also an appropriate gift for more experienced chefs, as an upgrade to their most well-loved items in their kitchen.

categories/essentials.name: French Wire Whisk, 10"
categories/essentials.description: We enlisted the help of Best Manufacturers to design a custom wire whisk that will enhance your savory specialities–think bechamel, vinaigrette or pan sauce. How? Instead of simply aerating your ingredients, it efficiently emulsifies them–creating the perfect blend for your dish. And to ensure no drop is abandoned, the elongated form and thin, springy wire enable the whisk to graze every inch of your saucepans and bowls. Made in the USA, it features a wooden handle featuring a mini apron that nods to our namesake.

categories/essentials.name: Olive Wood Spoon
categories/essentials.description: Made from Italian-grown olive wood, this sturdy 14” spoon combines old-world charm with modern convenience. Stain and odor resistant, it won’t scratch porcelain, ceramic, glass or enamel surfaces, making it the go-to choice for all your cooking needs. And no need to keep temperatures low–these multi-purpose, blunt-end spoons are heat-resistant.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Eddington

categories/essentials.name: Exoglass Spatula
categories/essentials.description: Run-of-the-mill spatulas are no match for hard-to-handle foods. That’s why we depend on this incredibly durable, non-stick spatula by Matfer. It’s the go-to essential for any flipping or frying endeavor, and because it’s made with a long-lasting material, it won’t deteriorate or rust over time. Oh, and did we mention it’s heat resistant up to 430°F?

categories/essentials.name: Slotted Spatula
categories/essentials.description: Flawless flips are at your fingertips with this commercial-grade slotted spatula. It’s designed with delicate fish in mind, but we’ve come to rely on it for anything that requires tricky flipping, like over-easy eggs and paper-thin crepes. That’s because it features a low-angled beveled edge and flexible blade that makes it easy to master any flip and keep your most fragile food intact.

categories/essentials.name: Zester-Grater
categories/essentials.description: The kitchen essential the savviest of chefs–including our own–rely upon, this multi-tasking tool will shave serious time off your cooking. It was originally adapted from a woodworking device into a makeshift zester by a clever cook who borrowed it from her husband. Today, it’s produced using a state-of-the-art etching process to create an ultra-sharp cutting surface for effortless grating. Use it to transform hard cheeses, garlic, citrus and ginger—you won’t know how you managed to live without it!
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Microplane
categories/essentials.cms_text:
The Story Behind Microplane

Originally engineered for woodworking, the Microplane zester found its way into the kitchen after a clever cook borrowed the tool from her spouse to zest citrus. With a few modifications, the zester soon became a must-have for home cooks and professional chefs alike, who prized for its ability to make light work of kitchen tasks. Each stainless steel Microplane grater is produced using a state-of-the-art etching process to create an ultra-sharp cutting surface that allows its handler to effortlessly grate foods.

categories/essentials.name: Heat-Proof Silicone Spatula, 11"
categories/essentials.description: We’re fans of revolutionizing. That’s why we partnered with the innovators at GIR to create the most versatile spatula our Culinary team has ever cooked with. Founded as a passion project by designer Samantha Rose, who was tired of cooking with old-school kitchen utensils, GIR designed this multi-use spatula that works like a dream and can withstand scalding hot temperatures. Both multi-functional and easy on the eyes, it features a strong polymer core that retains little heat–in fact it’s heat-resistant at up to 550°F.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by GIR for Blue Apron
categories/essentials.cms_text:
The Story Behind GIR

Launched in 2012, the first GIR spatula was a passion project for founder Sam Rose, who was frustrated with cooking utensils that just didn't feel right. She labored to create her dream tool, a multi-use spatula that could withstand truly high heat and look great at the same time. After a successful Kickstarter campaign powered by numerous fans and devoted customers, GIR designed, built, and launched this revolutionary spatula.

categories/essentials.name: Silicone-Tipped Tongs, 12"
categories/essentials.description: (Almost) as big of a multi-tasker as you, these do-it-all locking tongs are designed to help you serve, fry, grill, sautée and much more. They’re made by German company Messermeister, which has made it its mission to make cutting-edge tongs that transform the way we cook. Their founder Bernd Dressler got his start in cutlery in 1967 before spending over a decade traveling the US to gain insight from culinary professionals. Today, the company he founded, which sells a broad range of kitchen products, is owned entirely by females and is as committed to quality and innovation as ever. The team works with a master craftsmen in Germany to create high-performance tools, like these strong and durable multipurpose tongs. Boasting silicone-coated tong head and silicone-cushioned handles, these tongs provide a sturdy, non-slip grip that’s equipped to handle any skillet or saucepan scenario with ease. Consider them the new MVP of your kitchen drawer.

categories/essentials.name: Mrs. Anderson’s Baking Cotton Cooking Twine
categories/essentials.description: This sturdy cotton twine does it all, making tasks like trussing poultry and securing stuffed foods to making sausages and curing meats a breeze. Made in America from 100% all-natural cotton, its uses also extend beyond the kitchen—use it for crafts, tying up plants, drying flowers and herbs, and so much more.

categories/essentials.name: Stainless Steel Strainer
categories/essentials.description: Our test kitchen depends on this sturdy yet lightweight strainer for everything from straining sauces and draining pasta to washing fruits and vegetables. Made with a double-fine mesh, its looped handle enables you to conveniently hang it after use. It’s the tireless all-purpose essential you’ll use and reuse.

categories/essentials.name: Utensil Crock
categories/essentials.description: Featuring a cobalt blue rim and a smooth, glossy, non-porous exterior, the Quatro Utensil Crock from California-based BIA Cordon Bleu will help you keep all of your essential kitchen utensils in one stylish place. Made of durable porcelain stoneware, it’s harder to break (thankfully) than earthenware, and easy to clean. BIA Cordon Bleu has been crafting superb stoneware, porcelain dinnerware, glassware and bakeware for 60 years.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by BIA Cordon Bleu

categories/essentials.name: Grill & Oven Thermometer
categories/essentials.description:
Backordered: Estimated ship date 02/02/2018

The secret to successfully cooking meats is all in the temperature, which is why the meat thermometer is a must-have in every kitchen. Designed to work with both an oven and a grill, this versatile stainless steel version can either rest on top of a grill grate or oven rack in order to measure the ambient temperature of the cooking environment. Plus, if you’re short on space, you can even hang it from the edge of an oven rack.

categories/essentials.name: Meat Thermometer
categories/essentials.description: Make temperature taking the simplest step of your cooking process. Made by Taylor, a leader in easy-to-use instrument design since 1851, this thermometer is trusted by professional and amateur chefs around the world. It features an FDA recommended 1.5mm diameter step-down probe tip and an anti-microbial plastic storage case that prevents the growth of bacterial odor and mold. Easily calibrated in the field, it has a temperature range of - 40 to 450°F and features a six-second response time, so you can almost instantly learn the temperature of your meat to ensure the best possible taste.

categories/essentials.name: Mauviel Roasting Pan with Rösle Marinade Injector
categories/essentials.description: Roast perfectly crisp, flavorful and juicy meats, poultry and vegetables in this handcrafted roasting pan by Mauviel, who have been manufacturing cookware since 1830. Made from multi-ply stainless steel with a reinforced non-drip edge, its oversized cast stainless steel handles are easy to grasp when you’re taking the pan in and out of the oven. An accompanying marinade injector by Rösle ensures your meats are always rich and flavorful.

categories/essentials.name: The Blue Apron
categories/essentials.description: More than just a fashion statement, the blue apron is a symbol of lifelong learning in the kitchen.  The custom version of our namesake is modeled after aprons worn by professional chefs worldwide. With a double-lined bib and an embroidered Blue Apron logo, this 100% cotton, premium apron will elevate your comfort level in the kitchen and prepare you to try any recipe.
categories/essentials.cms_text:
#myblueapron

Dicing carrots in your kitchen? Taking a cooking class in Cinque Terre? Wear your apron with pride!
Post a photo of yourself using #myblueapron, and we may feature you here!

categories/essentials.name: The Children's Blue Apron
categories/essentials.description: This kid-sized apron will transform the hungriest helpers into the cutest cooks in the kitchen. Like our adult version, this bold blue apron is modeled after the same designs worn by professional chefs around the world. It’s made with a double-lined bib and features a contrasting embroidered Blue Apron logo. It’s an easy (and adorable) way to inspire an early and lifelong love of cooking.

categories/essentials.name: Box Grater
categories/essentials.description: Variety is a hallmark of any adventurous kitchen, and this box grater provides plenty of it. Complete with a slicing edge and four precision-cut grater surfaces, it yields coarse, medium, fine and super fine textures. Use it to shred carrots, cheeses, potatoes and more into delicious toppers and ingredients for an array of dishes. It features an easy-grip handle for comfort and efficiency and a straight-edged base that doesn’t collect stray pieces, meaning your clean up just got a lot easier.

categories/essentials.name: Margrethe Nested Mixing Bowls, Set of 3
categories/essentials.description: These streamlined mixing bowls by Rosti Mepal, which were originally designed in Denmark in 1954, are iconic for a reason—not only are they high quality and high functioning, they were named after the Princess, now Queen Margrethe of Denmark. Their durable melamine construction means they’ll be an integral part of your kitchen for years to come. A no-slip ring on the bottom makes for easy whisking, whipping and stirring, while the clear lids let you go straight from prep to the fridge. We’ll take three please!
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Rosti Mepal

categories/essentials.name: Vegetable Peeler
categories/essentials.description: The simple, ergonomic design and super-sharp stainless steel blade is why we turned to Kuhn Rikon to create our custom vegetable peeler. We constantly reach for this tool in our kitchen, whether we’re peeling carrots or zesting lemons. Its Y-shaped handle allows for easy peeling of fruits and veggies in any shape and size, and the rounded tip even removes tricky potato eyes with ease. Crafted in Switzerland by Kuhn Rikon, this dishwasher safe, lightweight, all-purpose peeler stays sharp even with regular use.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Kuhn Rikon for Blue Apron
categories/essentials.cms_text:
The Story Behind Kuhn Rikon

Kuhn Rikon combines Swiss precision and quality craftsmanship with a touch of whimsy. The family-owned company has been in the cookware business for more than 80 years, reinventing classics and inventing new products that are both functional and fun. Its designers have reimagined basic vegetable peelers and can-openers as quirky accessories that lend kitchen prepwork a does of bright color and high style.

categories/essentials.name: Prep Bowls, 10 Piece Set
categories/essentials.description: Never underestimate the importance of mise en place, French for "set in place." Following a recipe can lead to mess and chaos in the kitchen—especially if it’s a recipe you’ve never tried before. That’s why the first step of every Blue Apron recipe is to prep your ingredients so they are ready to be transformed into something delicious.  This set of 10 elegant, chip-resistant prep bowls will help you keep your kitchen under control while you cook and stay ready every step of the way.  Stackable and durable these dishwasher, freezer, and microwave safe bowls can handle anything.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Luminarc

categories/essentials.name: Quarter-Sheet Pan
categories/essentials.description: An essential for every kitchen, this durable pan is perfect for whipping up dinner, whether you’re flying solo or cooking for two. As a smaller version of the classic pan sheet, it’s ideal for toasting up bread or roasting a small batch of seasonal veggies. Its compact size also makes it easy to store. As for the technical aspects of this tiny beauty, it’s rustproof, even-heating and has a galvanized steel reinforcement around the rim, adding to its strength.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Nordic Ware

categories/essentials.name: Half-Sheet Pan
categories/essentials.description:
An essential for every kitchen, this durable pan is perfect for everything from roasting vegetables and making crisp-crusted pizza to whipping up a batch of golden-brown chocolate chip cookies. Made with heavy-gauge aluminum, it’s durable and conducts heat uniformly and quickly. The sheet features wire-reinforced rims with round corners that allow for easier cleanup. 
As an added bonus, it’s just the right size for Blue Apron’s Family plan recipes.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Nordic Ware

categories/essentials.name: French Baking Dish, 2-Person Plan
categories/essentials.description: Presentation is everything, which is why we often turn to this understated yet sophisticated French baking dish crafted by the Pillivuyt family. It travels elegantly from the oven to the table, making it the perfect vehicle to bake and serve gratins, casseroles, mac ‘n cheese, cobblers and more. Each lightweight dish is fired at 2400 degrees, making it safe for the freezer, oven and broiler. The thin, even walls provide excellent heat conduction, and its non-porous glaze won’t absorb odors, flavors or stains. As an added bonus, this dish is the perfect size for Blue Apron’s 2-Person plan recipes. The Pillivuyt family founded a porcelain company in 1818 and have been creating fine culinary ceramics and elegant dinnerware ever since. Today the business is employee-owned and still operated near the town of Mehun-sur-Yevre, France. True to its 200-year heritage, Pillivuyt produces its modern collection with the same artisanal techniques used by generations of fine porcelain craftsmen.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Pillivuyt

categories/essentials.name: Measuring Spoons
categories/essentials.description: When you cook a Blue Apron meal, we do the measuring for you. But for the other nights of the week, precision makes all the difference in making a meal look, smell and taste its best. Professional chefs love these spoons because they're incredibly sturdy and dishwasher safe. New Jersey-based Harold Import Co., the go-to supplier of tools for commercial and Michelin-starred kitchens, donates a portion of each sale to the Careers Through Culinary Arts Program, which helps underserved students prepare for college and careers in hospitality.

categories/essentials.name: Measuring Cups
categories/essentials.description: Cooking with the right amount of ingredients can be the difference between a delicious dish and a cooking catastrophe. That’s why you’ll want these stainless steel measuring cups on hand to help you get all the ingredients just right. Made by Harold Import Co., the much-loved company of professional chefs and Michelin-starred kitchens alike, these handy essentials are incredibly sturdy and dishwasher safe. As a bonus, Harold Import Co. gives a portion of every sale to the Careers Through Culinary Arts Project, a non-profit organization that helps disadvantaged youth prepare for college and careers in the restaurant and hospitality industry.

categories/essentials.name: 2-Quart Colander
categories/essentials.description: Making meals with minimal mess just got easier with this sleek stainless steel colander. With its sturdy base and conveniently sized handles, it’s perfect for rinsing fresh produce, draining pasta and washing veggies.

categories/essentials.name: 5-Quart Colander
categories/essentials.description: Make cooking for a crowd easier with this handy essential. Our Culinary team’s go-to colander is perfect for rinsing fresh produce, draining pasta, washing veggies and beyond. And its sturdy base and easy grip add extra layer of convenience to your cooking.

categories/essentials.name: Salad Spinner, 2-3 Servings
categories/essentials.description: Drying your leafy greens doesn’t have to be a hassle when you use this Swiss-designed, award-winning salad spinner. It’s perfect for tackling the first step of any recipe, from Blue Apron and beyond: washing and drying your fresh produce. Simply press the button, watch your lettuce spin and voilà–you’re one step closer to a delicious salad.

categories/essentials.name: USA Pan Stainless Steel Small Stockpot
categories/essentials.description: Look like a pro while you cook like a pro! Give your ingredients all the room they need to cook with this 3-quart stockpot from USA Pan. This stockpot is ideal for cooking pasta, soup or grains and has excellent heat retention so that your food stays warm from stovetop to tabletop. USA Pan’s cookware is handcrafted in the USA from five-ply stainless steel with aluminum core, allowing for even heat distribution and all-around perfect, flavor-filled cooking. Two entrepreneurially spirited brothers, John Bundy Sr. and Russell T. Bundy founded a commercial bakeware company in 1959 in pursuit of the “American Dream.” In 2009, the Bundy Family launched USA Pan with home bakers in mind. Three generations of the Bundy Family have since owned and operated their bakeware business out of the Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania area.

categories/essentials.name: Large Maple Cutting Board
categories/essentials.description:
Backordered: Estimated ship date 05/01/2018

Our chefs agree: the key to a proper prep station is a durable cutting board. Built to last, this hardy American maple chopping board can handle all your prepping needs, one rough chop at a time. Its durable surface won’t warp, is resistant to scoring and magically, it’ll even keep your blades sharper than other materials. Crafted in an exclusive collaboration between Blue Apron and John Boos & Co., these boards can be found in our test kitchen as well as professional kitchens around the world. Plus, it’s so elegant we never want to take it off of our countertops.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by John Boos & Co. for Blue Apron
categories/essentials.cms_text:
The Story Behind John Boos & Co.

There’s a reason why John Boos & Co.’s cutting boards are the standard in the culinary world. These hardwood goods are exceptionally made to stand the test of time. The Illinois-based company has had some practice—more than 125 years of it. In addition to its proud heritage, John Boos & Co. is also committed to environmentally responsible production, ensured by partnerships with hardwood foresters that follow sustainable practices.

categories/essentials.name: Chef & Petty Knife Set
categories/essentials.description: This handcrafted twinset is designed to tackle the trickiest chopping challenges. A personal favorite of Blue Apron co-founder and chef Matt Wadiak, Togiharu is a renowned maker of the finest Japanese steel and uses traditional techniques perfected over centuries. Our Culinary team worked closely with the makers of Togiharu to create a chef and petty knife set that’s enviably durable, sharp and easy to use, boasting stainless steel blades with impeccable edge retention. The result rivals the quality and precision of blades used by the world’s most celebrated chefs.
categories/essentials.cms_text:
The Story Behind Togiharu for Blue Apron

Blue Apron Co-Founder and Chef Matthew Wadiak is a long-time fan of Korin, a tiny storefront in Manhattan that’s home to the most extensive collection of Japanese chef’s knives in the world (including Japan). In addition to the array of imported knives, Korin produces its own collection, Togiharu, named for the master Japanese craftsman who mentored Korin’s founder. The line is handmade in Japan using traditional techniques perfected over centuries. Our culinary team worked closely with the makers of Togiharu to create knives for the home cook with the same elegance and performance of those found in the hands of professional chefs. The final creation is a pleasure to use and designed to be a part of your kitchen arsenal for decades.

categories/essentials.name: Handcrafted Japanese Chef's Knife, 8.2"
categories/essentials.description: Every skilled chef’s secret weapon, the right chef’s knife can simplify any cooking experience–and cut prep time in half. We joined forces with Togiharu, a world-class purveyor of Japanese steel and a favorite of Blue Apron co-founder Matt Wadiak, to create a chef’s knife that suits both experienced and budding chefs alike. Handcrafted in Japan, this exclusive knife is crafted using traditional Japanese techniques perfected over centuries, and features a sharp, stainless steel blade that allows for ultra-refined cuts.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Togiharu for Blue Apron
categories/essentials.cms_text:

In addition to the array of imported knives, Korin produces its own collection, Togiharu, named for the master Japanese craftsman who mentored Korin’s founder. The line is handmade in Japan using traditional techniques perfected over centuries. Our culinary team worked closely with the makers of Togiharu to create knives for the home cook with the same elegance and performance of those found in the hands of professional chefs. The final creation is a pleasure to use and designed to be a part of your kitchen arsenal for decades.

categories/essentials.name: Handcrafted Bread Knife
categories/essentials.description: If freshly baked breads are a fixture in your household, then this handcrafted knife deserves a spot in your kitchen. Made in Japan, it cuts through the toughest crusts without crushing the soft interior (a.k.a. everyone’s favorite part). To create this premium bread knife, we worked with Togiharu–a purveyor of Japanese steel and a favorite of Blue Apron co-founder Matt Wadiak. It not only slices bread with ease, but can also cut delicate fruits and vegetables with precision.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Togiharu for Blue Apron

categories/essentials.name: Handcrafted Japanese Petty Knife, 5.8"
categories/essentials.description: Handcrafted in Japan, our chef-approved petty knife meticulously masters the most intricate hand-prep tasks–think hulling fruit, supreming citrus or seeding peppers. Our Culinary team worked closely with Togiharu, a world-class purveyor of Japanese steel and a favorite of Blue Apron co-founder Matt Wadiak, to design a more petite version of our popular chef’s knife. Boasting a super sharp stainless steel blade and edge retention, it’s the knife you’ll enlist to handle the most delicate of tasks.
