categories/essentials.name: Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil
categories/essentials.description: A high-quality olive oil is the not-so-secret ingredient that can transform your meal. Its complex flavor is best savored at room temp as an addition to  your vinaigrettes, or as a finishing drizzle on pastas, grains, crostatas and—our personal favorite—avocado toast. So don’t go using this special bottle for sautéing or frying! Medium-bodied with a robust profile, this organic Italian blend from Frog Hollow Farm is a balanced combination made from four Italian varietals. The resulting green-gold oil is aromatic and rich with bold, grassy flavors and classic Tuscan spice.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Frog Hollow Farm

categories/essentials.name: The Chopping Station
categories/essentials.description: Prep work becomes simple when you’re using the sharpest knives on a great cutting board. That’s why we’ve partnered with both Togiharu, a renowned maker of the finest Japanese steel, and John Boos & Co., the industry standard in chopping blocks, to bring you our favorite two knives and the board that helps them work fast and keeps them sharp. Japanese knives, known for their lightness and sharp blades, stay that way longer when used on the maple board.

categories/essentials.name: All-Purpose Kosher Sea Salt
categories/essentials.description: Whether you’re cooking, baking or finishing off a dish, the lively flavors of this sea salt are a perfect fit for your pantry. After all, salt with the right coarseness can make all the difference in enhancing a meal’s flavor. Hand-harvested off the coast of Oregon, Jacobsen’s exquisite sea salt is a favorite staple of Michelin-starred kitchens and one of our Culinary team’s tried-and-true favorites.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Jacobsen Salt Co

categories/essentials.name: Finishing Flake Salt
categories/essentials.description: Because your meals deserve a little savory burst with every bite! This flaky finishing salt is a staple in several Michelin-starred kitchens for a reason. It’s hand-sorted flake by flake to ensure that every juicy steak, over-easy egg, slice of avocado toast or even dessert you sprinkle it upon has a satisfyingly delicious crunch.
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Jacobsen Salt Co
categories/essentials.cms_text:
The Story Behind Jacobsen Salt Co.

Proprietor Ben Jacobsen began making salt as a hobby during a post-college stint in Scandinavia. When he moved back to the U.S., his craft turned into a business, and he started Jacobsen Salt Co. Straight from the cold waters of Netarts Bay, off the Oregon coast, this sea salt is at once delicious and beautiful.

categories/essentials.name: Extra Bold Tellicherry Peppercorns
categories/essentials.description: A few twists of freshly-cracked pepper are  key to making a meal go from delicious to divine. Oaktown Spice’s extra-bold Tellicherry Peppercorns are the best of the best: top tier peppercorns from India's most sought-after peppercorn region, Tellicherry, Kerala, on India’s Malabar Coast. Upon harvesting, the peppercorns are sorted by size and color—only the largest and darkest berries make the grade of extra bold. Specially packed for Blue Apron, these peppercorns have fruity and floral pepper notes, hints of citrus and wood, and a bold heat that packs a tasty punch!
categories/essentials.subtitle: by Oaktown Spice Shop for Blue Apron
categories/essentials.cms_text:
The Story Behind Oaktown Spice Shop

Oaktown Spice Shop is a small store in Oakland, California run by John Beaver and Erica Perez, purveyors known for sourcing and packaging incredible spices on a small scale. With their vast knowledge of spices and commitment to quality, they handpick the finest goods to share with lucky visitors to their shop, and now with Blue Apron customers. Photo by Jennifer Martine.

categories/time-savers.name: The Prep Bundle
categories/time-savers.description: Prep like a pro with the right chef-approved essentials. This all-in-one assortment includes an easy-to-use garlic press, time-saving citrus squeeze, small-yet-mighty greens stripper, tried-and-true peeler and state-of-the-art zester. It’s the perfect assortment for novice and experienced chefs alike and will make even the most time-consuming cooking seem like a breeze.

categories/time-savers.name: Zester-Grater
categories/time-savers.description: The kitchen essential the savviest of chefs–including our own–rely upon, this multi-tasking tool will shave serious time off your cooking. It was originally adapted from a woodworking device into a makeshift zester by a clever cook who borrowed it from her husband. Today, it’s produced using a state-of-the-art etching process to create an ultra-sharp cutting surface for effortless grating. Use it to transform hard cheeses, garlic, citrus and ginger—you won’t know how you managed to live without it!
categories/time-savers.subtitle: by Microplane
categories/time-savers.cms_text:
The Story Behind Microplane

Originally engineered for woodworking, the Microplane zester found its way into the kitchen after a clever cook borrowed the tool from her spouse to zest citrus. With a few modifications, the zester soon became a must-have for home cooks and professional chefs alike, who prized for its ability to make light work of kitchen tasks. Each stainless steel Microplane grater is produced using a state-of-the-art etching process to create an ultra-sharp cutting surface that allows its handler to effortlessly grate foods.

categories/time-savers.name: Greens Stripper
categories/time-savers.description: This time-saving tool will help you strip leaves in mere seconds. Small but mighty, it can be used to prep any green–whether you’re cooking with kale, Swiss chard, rosemary and beyond. Founded by a kitchen gadget inventor with more than 30 years of experience, this tiny tool has stripped over 8 million leaves–and more than 400,000 of them have been sold to date.

categories/time-savers.name: Citrus Squeeze
categories/time-savers.description: You can now add delicious (and healthy) citrus flavors to your favorite drinks and dishes in no time. Featuring solid “T” handles, a powerful lever, a heavy-duty hinge and an extra large bowl, this stainless steel essential is equipped to squeeze the juice from limes, small oranges, tangerines and other small citrus fruit. As an added perk, the looped handles make it easy to hang and store. Plus, it’s designed with an an easy-to-clean surface and no tarnishable ceramic coatings or finishes.

categories/time-savers.name: Vegetable Peeler
categories/time-savers.description: The simple, ergonomic design and super-sharp stainless steel blade is why we turned to Kuhn Rikon to create our custom vegetable peeler. We constantly reach for this tool in our kitchen, whether we’re peeling carrots or zesting lemons. Its Y-shaped handle allows for easy peeling of fruits and veggies in any shape and size, and the rounded tip even removes tricky potato eyes with ease. Crafted in Switzerland by Kuhn Rikon, this dishwasher safe, lightweight, all-purpose peeler stays sharp even with regular use.
categories/time-savers.subtitle: by Kuhn Rikon for Blue Apron
categories/time-savers.cms_text:
The Story Behind Kuhn Rikon

Kuhn Rikon combines Swiss precision and quality craftsmanship with a touch of whimsy. The family-owned company has been in the cookware business for more than 80 years, reinventing classics and inventing new products that are both functional and fun. Its designers have reimagined basic vegetable peelers and can-openers as quirky accessories that lend kitchen prepwork a does of bright color and high style.

categories/time-savers.name: Garlic Press
categories/time-savers.description: Slicing garlic has never been simpler. This two-sided essential is designed to do two jobs in one: crush garlic and slice it. Made by Harold Import Company, a family-owned American business with over 50 years of experience, this easy-to-use press owes its incredible durability to its heavyweight, stainless steel construction. To use it, simply place the clove in the hopper and press downward for freshly pressed garlic, or flip it over to get uniform slices of garlic. And to ensure minimal mess, it includes a handy cleaning tool for removing leftover pressed garlic after use.

categories/time-savers.name: Food Chopper
categories/time-savers.description: In search of a food preparer that makes essential kitchen tasks like chopping, puréeing and grinding easy and effortless? Look no further than the Cuisinart Elite Collection™ 4 Cup Chopper/Grinder! Cut down your prep time by using this food chopper for all of your delicate chopping, soft puréeing and grinding needs! It’s so versatile, it’ll make you wonder how you ever survived in the kitchen without it. The ever-innovative Cuisinart, known for transforming American kitchens with their introduction of the food processor, continues to take essential kitchen tools to the next level.
categories/time-savers.subtitle: by Cuisinart

categories/time-savers.name: Come-Apart Kitchen Shears
categories/time-savers.description: One of the unsung heros of every kitchen, a pair of handy kitchen shears can significantly improve your cooking experience. That’s why our Culinary team depends on these Swiss-made kitchen shears by Victorinox for everything from trimming meats to cutting herbs. They’re ergonomically designed with textured, slip-resistant handles for ease of use in any meal prep scenario. Plus, the handle features a built-in bottle opener, so you’ll want them on hand when entertaining.
categories/time-savers.subtitle: by Victorinox

categories/time-savers.name: Salad Spinner, 2-3 Servings
categories/time-savers.description: Drying your leafy greens doesn’t have to be a hassle when you use this Swiss-designed, award-winning salad spinner. It’s perfect for tackling the first step of any recipe, from Blue Apron and beyond: washing and drying your fresh produce. Simply press the button, watch your lettuce spin and voilà–you’re one step closer to a delicious salad.

Simply press the button, watch your lettuce spin and voilà–you’re one step closer to a delicious salad.
categories/time-savers.subtitle: by Zyliss

categories/time-savers.name: Benriner Mandoline Slicer
categories/time-savers.description: Prep fruits and vegetables with the ease of a chef with this simple yet savvy slicer. Made from handcrafted Japanese stainless steel blades, this convenient tool will slice your ingredients into consistently sized pieces that cook evenly. It features four interchangeable blades for wide slices, chunky cuts, long narrow and extra-narrow julienne strips, so you can whip up French fries, garnishes, stir fries and beyond. For added safety, it’s designed with a guard that holds smaller pieces to protect your fingers and an easy dial that adjusts thickness. Easy to use, it also boasts large open handles for comfort and a nonskid rubber base for optimal stability.

categories/time-savers.name: Mix N' Masher
categories/time-savers.description: Enjoy perfectly fluffy mashed potatoes (and yams, squash, turnips, bananas...and more!) with this sturdy masher. Made from durable stainless steel that will never rust, it’s user-friendly—just press wires into soft cooked foods until your desired consistency is achieved— and easy to clean.

categories/time-savers.name: Box Grater
categories/time-savers.description: Variety is a hallmark of any adventurous kitchen, and this box grater provides plenty of it. Complete with a slicing edge and four precision-cut grater surfaces, it yields coarse, medium, fine and super fine textures. Use it to shred carrots, cheeses, potatoes and more into delicious toppers and ingredients for an array of dishes. It features an easy-grip handle for comfort and efficiency and a straight-edged base that doesn’t collect stray pieces, meaning your clean up just got a lot easier.

categories/time-savers.name: Precision Master 5.5 Qt. Stand Mixer
categories/time-savers.description: Simple, stylish and high-performing, this Cuisinart Stand Mixer will save you time and effort in your baking and cooking endeavors. Featuring a 500-watt motor, die-cast metal construction and 12 speeds for precision mixing, this multi-functional workhorse has a tilt-back head that allows for easy access to its mixing bowl, while the included splash guard make messy countertops a thing of the past.
categories/time-savers.subtitle: by Cuisinart

categories/time-savers.name: Immersion Blender
categories/time-savers.description: Blending is a breeze with our sleek Smart Stick 2 Speech Hand Blender by Cuisinart. Featuring a two-speed, 200-watt motor, it swiftly blends whatever you’re craving in mere minutes—think puréed soup, a warming cup of hot chocolate, or a refreshing and nutritious breakfast smoothie. It's ergonomically designed grip offers comfortable hold and more control while blending, while a one-touch control allows for easy, one-handed blending.
categories/time-savers.subtitle: by Cuisinart

categories/time-savers.name: Marinade Injector
categories/time-savers.description: Make your marinade work harder, with minimal effort. This Stainless Steel Marinade Injector enhances the juiciness, tenderness and flavor of any meat. Simply inject the meat with your favorite marinade, whether it’s a traditional preparation or any other flavorful liquid, from beer to salad dressing, and enjoy!

categories/pantry.name: Blue Apron x Irving Farm Chef's Blend Coffee
categories/pantry.description: We’re delighted to bring you our Blue Apron Chef’s Blend—our first signature coffee—created in collaboration with Irving Farm Coffee Roasters. Available exclusively on our Market, this lush, full-bodied roast was produced by Irving Farm Coffee Roasters in Millerton, New York. Developed by our Test Kitchen to draw in notes of warm spices and rich caramel, our Chef’s Blend creates a balanced flavor with hints of sweetness.
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Irving Farm and Blue Apron

categories/pantry.name: Don Pancho, Parainema Variety
categories/pantry.description: A generation ago, Jose Francisco Portillo, known as Don Pancho, planted a field of coffee trees in the cool, mountainous Santa Bárbara region of Honduras. This delicious Don Pancho Honduras coffee is the legacy of his and family’s hard work. Now run by Don Pancho’s son Roberto, Don Pancho Farm grows a number of specialty coffee varieties, including Parainema, sourced and roasted by our friends at Irving Farm. We love it for its vibrant flavor and citrusy notes.
categories/pantry.subtitle: By Irving Farm

categories/pantry.name: Rainforest Blend Coffee
categories/pantry.description: A unanimous favorite in our test kitchen, this robust, full-bodied coffee combines notes of dark chocolate with a smoky finish. Made from beans that have been responsibly and sustainably sourced, the delicious blend was created as a partnership between Irving Farm and the Rainforest Foundation, which works to secure the rights of indigenous peoples and restore the earth’s rainforests. Because of its smooth, not bitter, finish, it’s incredibly drinkable, whether paired with food or enjoyed on its own. Let’s raise a mug!
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Irving Farm

categories/pantry.name: All-Purpose Kosher Sea Salt
categories/pantry.description: Whether you’re cooking, baking or finishing off a dish, the lively flavors of this sea salt are a perfect fit for your pantry. After all, salt with the right coarseness can make all the difference in enhancing a meal’s flavor. Hand-harvested off the coast of Oregon, Jacobsen’s exquisite sea salt is a favorite staple of Michelin-starred kitchens and one of our Culinary team’s tried-and-true favorites.
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Jacobsen Salt Co

categories/pantry.name: Extra Bold Tellicherry Peppercorns
categories/pantry.description: A few twists of freshly-cracked pepper are  key to making a meal go from delicious to divine. Oaktown Spice’s extra-bold Tellicherry Peppercorns are the best of the best: top tier peppercorns from India's most sought-after peppercorn region, Tellicherry, Kerala, on India’s Malabar Coast. Upon harvesting, the peppercorns are sorted by size and color—only the largest and darkest berries make the grade of extra bold. Specially packed for Blue Apron, these peppercorns have fruity and floral pepper notes, hints of citrus and wood, and a bold heat that packs a tasty punch!
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Oaktown Spice Shop for Blue Apron
categories/pantry.cms_text:
The Story Behind Oaktown Spice Shop

Oaktown Spice Shop is a small store in Oakland, California run by John Beaver and Erica Perez, purveyors known for sourcing and packaging incredible spices on a small scale. With their vast knowledge of spices and commitment to quality, they handpick the finest goods to share with lucky visitors to their shop, and now with Blue Apron customers. Photo by Jennifer Martine.

categories/pantry.name: The Fixings
categories/pantry.description: The only three ingredients we don’t include in our box, available in one handy bundle: salt, pepper and olive oil. The quality of your ingredients can make all the difference when it comes to the tastiness of your meal. That’s why we’re sharing the highest-quality, most delicious incarnations of each! Cooking tip: top your dish with a sprinkle of salt and a dash of oil for a strong finishing touch!

categories/pantry.name: Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil
categories/pantry.description: A high-quality olive oil is the not-so-secret ingredient that can transform your meal. Its complex flavor is best savored at room temp as an addition to  your vinaigrettes, or as a finishing drizzle on pastas, grains, crostatas and—our personal favorite—avocado toast. So don’t go using this special bottle for sautéing or frying! Medium-bodied with a robust profile, this organic Italian blend from Frog Hollow Farm is a balanced combination made from four Italian varietals. The resulting green-gold oil is aromatic and rich with bold, grassy flavors and classic Tuscan spice.
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Frog Hollow Farm

categories/pantry.name: Olive Wood & Concrete Salt Keeper
categories/pantry.description: Keep your salt housed in this stylish olive wood and concrete salt keeper. With its wide mouth and sturdy base, this salt keeper makes it easy and convenient to grab a pinch and season to taste as you cook. After all, salting to taste as you go is critical to flavor development—it teases out the natural flavors and richness of ingredients. Plus, the elegant olive wood lid was handcrafted by artisans, so each piece is unique.
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Bérard

categories/pantry.name: Brass Pepper Mill
categories/pantry.description: Handmade in Greece referencing the same methods used for the past 300 years, the Atlas mill is a unique piece of European tradition that is widely regarded as one the best in the world. Striking the perfect balance between beauty and utility, it’s responsible for the origin of the phrase “pepper grinder,” as it actually grinds the pepper as opposed to smashing it, like most pepper mills. Built to last, it features a durable body and a tool steel grinding mechanism that makes for stress-free seasoning.
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Atlas Pepper Mills

categories/pantry.name: Salt Keeper & Pepper Mill Set
categories/pantry.description: Our salt keeper and pepper mill set is a dream duo for your kitchen counter. The pepper mill is handmade in Greece referencing the same methods used for the past 300 years.  Striking the perfect balance between beauty and utility, it’s responsible for the origin of the phrase “pepper grinder,” as it actually grinds the pepper as opposed to smashing it, like most pepper mills. Built to last, it features a durable body and a tool steel grinding mechanism that makes for stress-free seasoning.  Meanwhile, with its wide mouth and sturdy base, this salt keeper makes it easy and convenient to grab a pinch and season to taste as you cook. After all, salting to taste as you go is critical to flavor development—it teases out the natural flavors and richness of ingredients. Plus, the elegant olive wood lid was handcrafted by artisans, so each piece is unique.

categories/pantry.name: Six Salt Sampler
categories/pantry.description: Looking for the perfect host or hostess gift? Jacobsen Salt’s Six Salt Sampler will be a welcomed addition to your friend’s kitchen—or even your own! The sampler includes an array of their infused salts: Pure Flake Salt, Lemon Zest Salt, Vanilla Bean Salt, Pinot Noir Salt, Ghost Chili Salt and Smoked Cherrywood Salt. Plus, each salt comes with pairing notes and recommended food pairings, so you can ensure you’re taking your tastebuds to even greater heights.
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Jacobsen Salt Co

categories/pantry.name: Finishing Flake Salt
categories/pantry.description: Because your meals deserve a little savory burst with every bite! This flaky finishing salt is a staple in several Michelin-starred kitchens for a reason. It’s hand-sorted flake by flake to ensure that every juicy steak, over-easy egg, slice of avocado toast or even dessert you sprinkle it upon has a satisfyingly delicious crunch.
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Jacobsen Salt Co
categories/pantry.cms_text:
The Story Behind Jacobsen Salt Co.

Proprietor Ben Jacobsen began making salt as a hobby during a post-college stint in Scandinavia. When he moved back to the U.S., his craft turned into a business, and he started Jacobsen Salt Co. Straight from the cold waters of Netarts Bay, off the Oregon coast, this sea salt is at once delicious and beautiful.

categories/pantry.name: Hot Honey
categories/pantry.description: Hello, honey! Spicy and sweet all at once, Jacobsen Salt’s Hot Honey is about to become your new condiment obsession. Enjoy it with fried chicken, pizza, all kinds of BBQ (think pulled pork shoulder, ribs and brisket), roasted vegetables, cheeses, cocktails and even ice cream. Using single-origin, sustainably produced, premium Bee Local honey, Jacobsen Salt’s Hot Honey stands out from the rest through their commitment to quality. Infused with Scorpion Chili Peppers (one of the world’s most fiery and flavorful peppers) and a dash of vinegar for balance, the flavor is as addictive as it is unique. For a perfect complement, try our Smoked Honey Sauce.
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Jacobsen Salt Co

categories/pantry.name: Smoked Honey Sauce
categories/pantry.description: Hello, honey! Smokey and sweet all at once, Jacobsen Salt’s Smoked Honey Sauce will become your new go-to condiment for all kinds of BBQ (think pulled pork shoulder, ribs and brisket), cheeses, roasted veggies, tacos, fried chicken and more! Using single-origin, sustainably produced, premium Bee Local honey, Jacobsen Salt’s Smoked Honey Sauce stands out from the rest through their commitment to quality. After cold-smoking the honey, it’s infused with Lapsang Souchong (smoked tea) and given a dash of apple cider vinegar for balance. Take our word for it: the result is one of the most distinctive and addictive products Jacobsen Salt has created to date. For a perfect complement, try our Hot Honey.
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Jacobsen Salt Co

categories/pantry.name: Harvest Conserve Trio
categories/pantry.description: Enjoy the fresh stone fruit flavors of summer, the spreadable way! The Harvest Conserve Trio includes three of Frog Hollow Farm’s best-selling conserves: Peach, Apricot and Nectarine-Plum. While great for gifting, these conserves are so delicious we suggest keeping a set for yourself, too!
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Frog Hollow Farm

categories/pantry.name: Nectarine Conserve
categories/pantry.description: Enjoy the fresh stone fruit flavors of summer, the spreadable way! Frog Hollow Farm’s tangy-sweet Nectarine Conserve is made from tree-ripened organic nectarines, simmered down just soft enough to be spreadable. Made with 80% fruit and less than 20% added sugar, this conserve brings the best of field-fresh nectarines to scones, muffins, toast and more.
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Frog Hollow Farm

categories/pantry.name: Plum-Blueberry Conserve
categories/pantry.description: Frog Hollow Farm cooks up their own tree-ripened organic plums with fresh blueberries from a partner farm to create this delicious Plum-Blueberry Conserve. Use it to add sweetness and texture to your morning muffin, pancakes and waffles, or even cheese and crackers. Another tip: Try mixing up a spoonful with Greek yogurt for a delightful treat!
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Frog Hollow Farm

categories/pantry.name: Meyer Lemon Marmalade
categories/pantry.description: Enjoy the brightness and tang of marmalade, minus the bitterness! Frog Hollow Farm uses Meyer lemons, a much milder counterpart to the traditional Eureka lemon, to create this fragrant spread. Use it to add delicious flavor and texture to your scones, toast and more. Another tip: We love mixing it in with cranberry sauce!
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Frog Hollow Farm

categories/pantry.name: Navel Orange Marmalade
categories/pantry.description: Enjoy the brightness and tang of marmalade, minus the bitterness! Frog Hollow Farm uses organic navel oranges to create this delightfully sweet spread, which adds delicious flavor and texture to your scones, muffins and more. Another tip: Try it with your favorite chicken or pork dishes.
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Frog Hollow Farm

categories/pantry.name: Asian Pear Chutney
categories/pantry.description: Enjoy the fresh fruit flavors of late summer, the spreadable way! We love Asian Pears for their shape, sweetness and crunch.  Frog Hollow Farm uses larger fruit pieces to preserve the pear’s signature crunch in this delightful chutney. It makes a great addition to a soft cheese and cracker plate, as well as a wonderful complement to any pork or poultry dish.
categories/pantry.subtitle: Sold out!

categories/pantry.name: Blue Apron x Raaka Cassia Cinnamon Chocolate
categories/pantry.description: Introducing our very first chocolate bar, created in exclusive collaboration with Raaka Chocolate. Our deliciously dark chocolate bar is made from scratch using the highest quality certified organic, unroasted cacao beans from the Dominican Republic. Our chefs spent months going back and forth with the experts at Raaka in order to achieve the perfect subtle cinnamon flavor to complement the beans. Talk about dark magic!

categories/pantry.name: Dark Chocolate Gift Set
categories/pantry.description: Chocolate lovers, rejoice! This pack of three delicious chocolate bars includes a cinnamon-tinged dark chocolate we created in collaboration with the experts at Raaka, along with two of Raaka’s most popular flavors—Bourbon Cask-Aged and Pink Sea Salt. All three bars are made from scratch, using the highest quality certified organic, unroasted cacao beans from the Dominican Republic.
categories/pantry.subtitle: By Raaka

categories/pantry.name: Glass Storage Jars, Set of 4
categories/pantry.description: It’s never been easier to display your dry goods in style. These glass jars will keep your beans, pasta, rice and more fresh while looking elegant on your shelves or countertops. Featuring French olive wood lids and crafted from borosilicate glass, they’re durable and scratch resistant.
categories/pantry.subtitle: by Bérard
